title: Hamilton NOT Accurate?!? 7.13.20
itunes:title: Hamilton NOT Accurate?!? 7.13.20
description:
In episode 670, Jack and Miles are joined by activist and #GoodMuslimBadMuslim co-host Taz Ahmed to discuss Hamilton on Disney+, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Hamilton is censored on Disney Plus; Lin-Manuel Miranda gives two fucks
  2. Disney+ Censors Cleavage From Episode of Old Disney Channel Series
  3. Disney Didn’t Just Buy ‘Hamilton’ for $75 Million; It Bought a Potential Franchise
  4. Disney CEO stresses Hamilton’s importance to Disney Plus in private all-hands meeting
  5. WATCH: Horace Silver: Soul Searchin'

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
